name: Peaches and Cream Smoothie
description: This tangy peach smoothie has a hit of ginger and maple syrup, inspired by the flavors of summer fruit desserts.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the kefir, peaches, maple syrup, and fresh ginger in a blender and pulse a few times to begin to break up the peaches. Then blend on high speed until completely smooth, about 1 minute. Serve immediately.
